Articles.Content:
Introducing: the BM-mt01 Multiple Transport Vehicle

For when you really need to cart more than 150 tons of fuel around...

It even articulates! Got a pretty terrible turning circle though...

Slopes and rugged terrain are no obstacle for this monster:

(download)

Mods used:

Kerbal Attachment System

Kommitz' Octagonal Truss Set

KW Rocketry

If you want to make your own, KAS is really the only mod you'll need. The Octagonal Truss Set and the battery banks from KW were only used because I didn't actually think this would work and they looked cool.

All rover wheels except the ones under the crew cabin should have their steering and motors disabled. It is highly recommended to use Precision Controls (capslock) so you don't stretch the KAS joints too much when moving off from a full stop.

Oh, and don't apply the brakes at high speed. It doesn't end well... (Though I guess that depends on your definition of 'ending well')
